entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Professor Flitwick's student who is praised for her performance of the Silencing Charm.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: A professor who teaches Charms and praises Miss Granger's performance.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters who is given additional practice on the Silencing Charm.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate who struggles to perform the Silencing Charm.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and classmates who jumps at Professor Flitwick's voice.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A teacher who is asked to try the Silencing Charm by Professor Flitwick.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A mischievous ghost who is floating in a classroom and occasionally blows ink pellets at students.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: A student who comes into the classroom where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are sitting.

relationships.description: Professor Flitwick praises Miss Granger's performance of the Silencing Charm.
Professor Flitwick asks Mr. Weasley to try the Silencing Charm.
Ron pokes the bullfrog in the eye with his wand.
